definitions.definition: A fatal cattle disease caused by the soil - borne bacterium Clostridium chauvoei ; symptomatic anthrax .
A disease of potato crops caused by pectolytic bacteria , characterized by blackening and decay of the lower stem portion.
A person who cheats in a game ; a cheater , especially a dishonest bookmaker .
A person who takes the place of striking workers .

main_definition: ( uncountable , agriculture , veterinary medicine ) A fatal cattle disease caused by the soil - borne bacterium Clostridium chauvoei ; symptomatic anthrax . [from 18th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A disease of potato crops caused by pectolytic bacteria , characterized by blackening and decay of the lower stem portion.
( countable ) A person who cheats in a game ; a cheater , especially a dishonest bookmaker . [from 18th c.]
( countable ) A person who takes the place of striking workers . [from 19th c.]
